title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

Connection (1 point)

· p53 is (constitutively/always) active (in MDM2 mutant)

· p53 is not degraded (regardless of DNA damage)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the following points

Connection (1 point)

· p53 is (constitutively/always) active (in MDM2 mutant)

· p53 is not degraded (regardless of DNA damage)

Student response earns one of the following points

Connection (1 point)

· p53 is (constitutively/always) active (in MDM2 mutant)

· p53 is not degraded (regardless of DNA damage)

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Prediction (1 point)

· Cell cycle will proceed (even in the presence of DNA damage)

Justification (1 point)

· Nonfunctional p53 (protein) cannot regulate the cell cycle
descriptions:

Justification (1 point)

· Nonfunctional p53 (protein) cannot regulate the cell cycle
